name: Mandar Sargawanshi
comment: Thank you, KC, for all the support you have extended right from shortlisting the university till helping me with my visa preparations. I really admire the attention and support of the KC Counsellors.

name: Aarohi Sighel
comment: The team made the entire process very easy. Everyone is very helpful and cooperative throughout. I am thankful to KC Sadar Team for making my dream come true.

name: Susan Mendonca
comment: Helped with counseling and making the right decision...great staff..would definitely recommend it to anyone planning to go abroad for studies..

name: Aarohi Sighel
comment: KC Sadar Team is very supportive and helpful. They guided me throughout the process and helped me get admission in my desired course.

name: Susan Mendonca
comment: KC Sadar Team is very supportive and helpful. They guided me throughout the process and helped me get admission in my desired course.
